Name: Taco Mundo
Review Text: I order from Taco Mundo several times a year when I am at home with the boys only (my wife doesn't like it :-) I really like the classic salad and their nachos a la mexicana. Not the best food in town but a very tasty meal that is always â€¦

Name: Taco Mundo
Review Text: Good for an emergency meal but there are better options out there. The taco itself was tasty but a little under filled. The fries were huge, enough for two people, and were standard fast food fare. The churros though were expensive for the portion size and very thin, greasy and chewy I won't be having them again!

Name: Taco Mundo
Review Text: Ordered more than 2 hours ago and still waiting..

Name: Taco Mundo
Review Text: About as Mexican as an IKEA. Store bought and raw tortillas, zero flavor, just a mushy and disgusting mess. Avoid this chain at all costs unless you hate yourself.

Name: Taco Mundo
Review Text: Hands down the worst Mexican food I've had in Amsterdam if not the world. I would recommend just cooking it yourself at home. Mexican food is very simple despite them messing it up so badly. If you've eaten somewhere like Taco Bell, this is â€¦

Name: Taco Mundo
Review Text: Barley OK.  I know I'm spoiled from growing up with great street tacos at my disposal all the time. But this place is a Dutch version of Taco Bell at best. It is very conveniently located and the food is good for what it is.

Name: Taco Mundo
Review Text: We actually ate at the store, so I can't say much of the delivery system. The service was good and the cashier was very helpful explaining what the food items consist of. â€¦

Name: Taco Mundo
Review Text: This is not what I was expecting. When you hear about Mexican food you imagine sth tasty but this was far away from being delicious or even close to an enchilada. I do not recommend this if you know what Mexican food is about.

Name: Taco Mundo
Review Text: Perfect for a quick pick up and go. Very tasty and almost Tex-Mex style. Didn't try the rice and beans so that will be the real test for my next visit.

Name: Taco Mundo
Review Text: Good soft shell street tacos. Really good for takeout. One of the few places here that sell Jarritos, so that alone makes it worth it.

Name: Taco Mundo
Review Text: we just ordered food from camping zeeburg  and we are missing a cheeserito with pulled beef and chipotle sauce ,wich we have already payed..we try to contact you by phone but there is something wrong...we would like it to bring it to us...thank you

Name: Taco Mundo
Review Text: Don't expect to get any authentic food here. This is a fast food restaurant, resembles Mexican food and tastes okay. The staff is good and quite friendly.
